events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has categorised the customer's complaint under the Refund cluster based on keywords.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle the refund request for the incorrect item shipped.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to verify the refund request?
Here is my order number 897654 and attached is the photo of the item that arrived, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for your prompt response and the refund offer. I appreciate the quick resolution to this problem.
The refund has been initiated successfully and the case is considered resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We just wanted to check if you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory regarding the resolution.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you for your help and follow-up, I am very satisfied with the service.
The case has now been formally closed following the successful refund and positive feedback from the customer.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience and resolution process.
